revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TL-MR3040 |revision=v1.x |upc=845973051853 |asin=B0088PPFP4 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=EoL |type=mobile router |fcc_date=10/08/2012 |fcc_id=TE7MR3040V1 |ic_id=8853A-MR3040V1 |pcb_id=2050500241 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=USB Female Micro-B |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9331 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S25FL032PIF |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Zentel |ram1_model=A3S56D40FTP-G5 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9331 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |flags=battery, 3G capable |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=TP-LINK_POCKET_3040_XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^TP-LINK_POCKET_3040_[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=64:70:02, 90:F6:52, A0:F3:C1 |oui_eth=64:70:02, 90:F6:52, A0:F3:C1 }} {{TagLine|Portable 3G Battery Powered Wireless N Router}} :[http://www.tp-link.us/products/details/?categoryid=3143&model=TL-MR3040 Product page]
"2050500241" and "Rev:1.1" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :The battery shown in the FCC photos is a TBL-68A2000 (3.7V, 2000mAh).
Default settings (including the SSID) are per the FCC manual.
The FCC EUT has a MAC label w/ a 90:F6:52 (''[[TP-LINK]]'') OUI. :It does indeed seem to be used... per '''WiGLE''' data. Additional OUIs of 64:70:02 and A0:F3:C1 are also found for :the SSID pattern and are presumed to be used in addition.
__NOTOC__
